tourBios.otherVics:
(9): 1985 British Columbia Open. 1988 Blue Light Pro-Am. 1990 Canadian PGA Championship. 1991 Sapporo Tokyu Open, Malaysian Open, Philippine PGA Championship. 1992 Philippine PGA Championship.
1995 Novell KSB Open. 2002 Philippine Open.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Conditionally-exempt for 2015 by virtue of his 10th-place finish at the Champions Tour National Qualifying Tournament in November at Orange County National near Orlando. Finished T10 with Cesar Monasterio after 72 holes but secured the 10th spot by making par on the first playoff hole...Spent the season competing on the European Senior Tour, where he won the Bad Ragaz PGA Seniors Open in July by six strokes for his first victory on that Tour...Had a nice effort at the Senior Open Championship in Wales, finishing T3 at Royal Porthcawl...Was also second to Colin Montgomerie at the Russian Open Golf Championship...Overall, had six top-10 finishes which led to a second place finish behind Montgomerie on the European Senior Tour's Order of Merit. 

.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Has traveled the world competing in the game and owns victories on Tours in Canada, Japan, Asia and Europe...Was a two-time winner on the Japan Golf Tour and also claimed three titles on the Canadian Tour...Was also victorious three times in the Philippines...Has made a handful of PGA TOUR starts...Represented Canada in the World Cup six times and also made three appearances in the Alfred Dunhill Cup for Canada and was part of the winning team in 1994 along with teammates Ray Stewart and Dave Barr at St. Andrews. They defeated the U.S. team in the finals that included Fred Couples, Curtis Strange and Tom Kite...Was a college standout at Brigham Young, where he earned All-American honors as a senior
tourBios.personal: Was one of the founding directors of the Asian Tour when it was inaugurated as a new organization in 2004...Is married to Filipino actress Josephine Garcia.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was T3rd in 2014 at the The Senior Open Championship presented by Rolex.
